title: India-EU Free Trade Agreement: A Landmark Deal Concluded!
content:
# India-EU Free Trade Agreement: A Landmark Deal Concluded!

Ek important update hai. Government ne India aur European Union ke beech ek landmark Free Trade Agreement (FTA) announce kiya hai.

Yeh deal January 27, 2026, ko conclude hua hai. Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi aur European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen ne iski ghoshna ki, jo lagbhag do dashak (nearly two decades) ki negotiations ke baad संभव हुआ है.

Is agreement ke mukhya points yeh hain:
*   **Uddeshya:** Iska main aim hai do-tarfa trade ko significantly boost karna, jismein most goods par tariffs ko reduce ya eliminate kiya jayega.
*   **EU ki Commitment:** European Union India se exports hone wale 99.5% items par tariffs drop karega.
*   **Expected Growth:** Aasha hai ki is deal se 2032 tak EU ka India ko exports double ho jayega.
*   **Prabhavit Sectors:** Textiles, pharmaceuticals, aur manufacturing jaise various sectors par iske substantial positive implications hain.

*Published on: 28 January 2026*
